com.example.noteation.adapters

Class TasksAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<TasksAdapter.TasksViewHolder>
      • com.example.noteation.adapters.TasksAdapter

  • public class TasksAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<TasksAdapter.TasksViewHolder>
    This class is in charge of linking the recyclerView in the "TasksFragment" view to create the tasks list

      Initializes one cell from the RecyclerView, checks if the task given is a time task or a location task it also sets an "OnClickListener" and checks it's a time task then "tasksFragment.onTaskClicked" function is called with "isTaskTime" = true, it it's not a time task it's set as false

      • onBindViewHolder

        public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull
                             TasksAdapter.TasksViewHolder holder,
                             int position)
        Initializes one cell from the RecyclerView, checks if the task given is a time task or a location task it also sets an "OnClickListener" and checks it's a time task then "tasksFragment.onTaskClicked" function is called with "isTaskTime" = true, it it's not a time task it's set as false
        Specified by:
        onBindViewHolder in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<TasksAdapter.TasksViewHolder>
        Parameters:
        holder - The specific cell in the RecycleView
        position - The position of the cell in the RecyclerView

      • getItemCount

        public int getItemCount()
        Specified by:

      • getItemViewType

        public int getItemViewType(int position)
        Overrides:
        getItemViewType in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<TasksAdapter.TasksViewHolder>

      • searchTasks

        public void searchTasks(java.lang.String searchKeyword)
        Search tasks function, compares the keywords entered and compares with title, subtitle or text. Creates a thread for each search and notifies the adaptor of the data change while the tasksList is now equal to the new temp list which has all the tasks who meet the search keywords
        Parameters:
        searchKeyword - The keyword searched by the user

      • cancelTimer

        public void cancelTimer()
        Cancels the timer for the search action

      • filterTasks

        public void filterTasks(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> colors,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> ratings,
                        int spinnerOption)
        Filters the tasks created by the user with the selections he made while choosing how to the tasks. It then creates a thread for each search and notifies the adaptor of the data change while the tasksList is now equal to the new temp list which has all the tasks who meet the filter requirements
        Parameters:
        colors - The array of colors filtered by the user
        ratings - The array of ratings filtered by the user
        spinnerOption - The spinner option selected by the user
